Package cz.vse.java.utils.xml

Class XMLSchemaValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vse.java.utils.xml.XMLSchemaValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXMLValidator
    public class XMLSchemaValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IXMLValidator

    The class of XMLSchemaValidator is used to abstractly define the type of the instances.

    This class provides methods for validating the XML against XMLSchema.

    Written for project "Utils".
    Version:
    13. 02. 2020
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů
    See Also:
    cz.vse.java.utils.xml, IXMLValidator, IXMLReader, IXMLWriter

        Parameters:
        XMLFilePath - the path to the xml file to be validated
        XMLSchemaFilePath - the file path to the validation schema

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
                 throws java.lang.Exception

        Validates the XML file against given schema. When the file does not correspond it, the method returns false, otherwise it returns true.

        Specified by:
        validate in interface IXMLValidator
        Returns:
        boolean value of the result of the validation against the given schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When the document is invalid or when any of the files is unreachable
